Data for use in defining HIGH-range UV particle absorption (phytoplankton plus detritus)
in the "new Case 1 IOP model":
   ap(wave) = A(wave)*[chl]^E(wave)
Based on
Bricaud et al., 1998, JGR 103(C13), 31033-31044 for 400-1000 nm
Vasilkov, et al., 2005, Applied Optics Vol 44, No. 14, pp2863-2869
Morrison and Nelson, 2004, L&O 49(1), 215-224. 
See the discussion of the new Case 1 IOP model for details. 
This file is formatted for use in HydroLight-EcoLight version 5.
  lambda      A         E
   300.0    0.1056    0.8524
   302.0    0.1092    0.8515
   304.0    0.1120    0.8507
   306.0    0.1145    0.8498
   308.0    0.1166    0.8483
   310.0    0.1175    0.8453
   312.0    0.1181    0.8423
   314.0    0.1177    0.8378
